sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_4645bbbbdbeafd10ccdf0bd3e29619e3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Custom Field Insights">2f1d8b33db6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619f8</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:096d0373db6afd10ccdf0bd3e296197c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Auto Populate Record Count</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   g_form.clearValue('record_count');

    var ga = new GlideAjax('global.CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils'); 
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getTableRecordCount');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_table_name', g_form.getValue('select_table')); 
    ga.getXML(RecordCountParse);
 
    function RecordCountParse(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		if (answer) {
			g_form.setValue('record_count', answer);
		}
    }
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-24 00:26:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4645bbbbdbeafd10ccdf0bd3e29619e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Populate Record Count</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4645bbbbdbeafd10ccdf0bd3e29619e3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-24 04:30:35</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_03b6b0e5db3a3550526c265d139619ae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Custom Field Insights">2f1d8b33db6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619f8</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:06f110a5dbb63550526c265d13961982</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Reset Query to Default</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
	g_form.hideFieldMsg('field_search_query');

    if (oldValue == 'true') {
		g_form.setReadOnly('field_search_query', true);
		g_form.addInfoMessage('resetting to default val');
        g_form.setValue('field_search_query', g_form.getValue('defaul_search_query'));
    }
	
	else if (oldValue == 'false' && newValue == 'true') {
		g_form.setReadOnly('field_search_query', false);
		g_form.showFieldMsg('field_search_query', 'Reminder, the baseline default query is STARTSWITHu_', 'info');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-28 21:01:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>03b6b0e5db3a3550526c265d139619ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reset Query to Default</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_03b6b0e5db3a3550526c265d139619ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-28 21:20:49</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_264e08a1dbb63550526c265d1396198c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Custom Field Insights">2f1d8b33db6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619f8</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7c7644e9db763550526c265d139619bf</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Show Custom Fields - field_search_query</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    if (g_form.getValue('select_table') == '') {
        getMessage("custom_field_check.client.no_table", function(msg) {
            g_form.addErrorMessage(msg);
            return;
        });
    }

    g_form.clearMessages();
    g_form.hideFieldMsg('select_table');

    g_form.clearValue('record_count');
    g_form.clearValue('field_checker_fields_in_scope');

    var ga = new GlideAjax('global.CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'createMVRSPayload');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_table_name', g_form.getValue('select_table'));
    ga.addParam('sysparm_search_query', g_form.getValue('field_search_query'));
    ga.getXML(CustomFieldCheckParse);

    function CustomFieldCheckParse(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
        if (answer) {
            answer = JSON.parse(answer);
            // Once we parse the answer. If there are no custom fields, only populate the record count. Don't try to populate the MVRS with null values.
            answer[0] == ('no_custom_fields') ? (function populateRecordCount() {
                g_form.showFieldMsg("select_table", answer[2], 'info');
                g_form.setValue('record_count', answer[1]);
            })() : (function populateMVRS() {
                var mvrsLimit = 50;
                if (parseInt(answer[3]) > mvrsLimit) {
                    getMessage("custom_field_check.mvrs_field_limit_reached", function(msg) {
                        var orginalPayload = answer[0];
                        var trimmedPayload = [];
                        g_form.addErrorMessage(msg);
                        for (var i = 0; i < mvrsLimit; i++) {
                            trimmedPayload.push(orginalPayload[i]);
                        }
                        g_form.setValue('field_checker_fields_in_scope', JSON.stringify(trimmedPayload));
                    });
                } else {
                    g_form.setValue('field_checker_fields_in_scope', JSON.stringify(answer[0]));
                }
                g_form.showFieldMsg("select_table", answer[2], 'info');
                g_form.setValue('record_count', answer[1]);
            })();
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-28 18:02:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>264e08a1dbb63550526c265d1396198c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Custom Fields - field_search_query</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_264e08a1dbb63550526c265d1396198c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-28 21:06:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_dcc2dbf7db6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619e2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Custom Field Insights">2f1d8b33db6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619f8</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:096d0373db6afd10ccdf0bd3e296197c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Show Custom Fields - select_table</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    if (g_form.getValue('field_search_query') == '') {
        getMessage("custom_field_check.client.no_query", function(msg) {
            g_form.addErrorMessage(msg);
            return;
        });
    }

	g_form.clearMessages();
    g_form.hideFieldMsg('select_table');

    g_form.clearValue('record_count');
    g_form.clearValue('field_checker_fields_in_scope');

    var ga = new GlideAjax('global.CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'createMVRSPayload');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_table_name', g_form.getValue('select_table'));
    ga.addParam('sysparm_search_query', g_form.getValue('field_search_query'));
    ga.getXML(CustomFieldCheckParse);

    function CustomFieldCheckParse(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
        if (answer) {
            answer = JSON.parse(answer);
            // Once we parse the answer. If there are no custom fields, only populate the record count. Don't try to populate the MVRS with null values.
            answer[0] == ('no_custom_fields') ? (function populateRecordCount() {
                g_form.showFieldMsg("select_table", answer[2], 'info');
                g_form.setValue('record_count', answer[1]);
            })() : (function populateMVRS() {
                var mvrsLimit = 50;
                if (parseInt(answer[3]) > mvrsLimit) {
                    getMessage("custom_field_check.mvrs_field_limit_reached", function(msg) {
                        var orginalPayload = answer[0];
                        var trimmedPayload = [];
                        g_form.addErrorMessage(msg);
                        for (var i = 0; i < mvrsLimit; i++) {
                            trimmedPayload.push(orginalPayload[i]);
                        }
                        g_form.setValue('field_checker_fields_in_scope', JSON.stringify(trimmedPayload));
                    });
                } else {
                    g_form.setValue('field_checker_fields_in_scope', JSON.stringify(answer[0]));
                }
                g_form.showFieldMsg("select_table", answer[2], 'info');
                g_form.setValue('record_count', answer[1]);
            })();
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-23 22:08:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>dcc2dbf7db6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>58</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Custom Fields - select_table</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_dcc2dbf7db6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-28 21:06:11</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_bc68a3bfdbaafd10ccdf0bd3e29619b0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Custom Field Insights">2f1d8b33db6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619f8</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Block Submission</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   
	
	alert('This item is for informational purposes, you may not submit.');
	return false;
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-23 23:26:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bc68a3bfdbaafd10ccdf0bd3e29619b0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Block Submission</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bc68a3bfdbaafd10ccdf0bd3e29619b0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-23 23:26:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e533933bdb6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619b4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils = Class.create();
CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    checkFieldUsage: function(table, fields, time) {
        try {
            var arrayFields, usageOutput = [],
                allRecords = 0;
            var countAll = new GlideAggregate(table);
            time ? countAll.addEncodedQuery(time) : gs.debug('No time value passed - CustomFieldChecker');
            countAll.addAggregate('COUNT');
            countAll.query();
            if (countAll.next()) {
                allRecords = countAll.getAggregate('COUNT');
            }

            arrayFields = fields.split(',');

            for (var field in arrayFields) {
                var emptyRecords = 0;
                var fieldUsageStatistic = {
                    field_name: arrayFields[field]
                };
                var countEmpty = new GlideAggregate(table);
                countEmpty.addAggregate('COUNT');
                countEmpty.addEncodedQuery(arrayFields[field] + 'ISNOTEMPTY');
                time ? countEmpty.addEncodedQuery(time) : gs.debug('No time value passed for the field array - CustomFieldChecker', 'CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils');
                countEmpty.query();
				
				// If we found some records that where our Custom Field was not empty proceed by taking the count value.
                countEmpty.next() ? (function recordCount() {
                    fieldUsageStatistic['records_using_field'] = countEmpty.getAggregate('COUNT');
                    emptyRecords = countEmpty.getAggregate('COUNT');
                })() : fieldUsageStatistic['records_using_field'] = 0;

				// Calculate the percentage value of our Empty records.
                emptyRecords != 0 ? (function recordPercentage() {
                    var percentUsed = parseFloat(emptyRecords / allRecords);
                    fieldUsageStatistic['percentage_using_field'] = (percentUsed * 100).toFixed(2) + '%';
                })() : fieldUsageStatistic['percentage_using_field'] = '0%';

                usageOutput.push(fieldUsageStatistic);

            }

            return [usageOutput, allRecords];
			
        } catch (err) {
            gs.error(err, 'CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils');
        }
    },

    createMVRSPayload: function() {
        try {
            var tableSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_table_name");
			var searchCriteria = this.getParameter("sysparm_search_query");
            var tableName = this.getTableAttribute(tableSysId, 'name');
            var mvrsFieldNames = String(gs.getProperty('custom_field_check.mvrs_fields')).split(',');
            var allCustomFields = [];

            gs.debug('MVRS Field Names: ' + String(mvrsFieldNames) + ' - CustomFieldChecker');

            var mvrsValues = [];
            var grDictionary = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
            grDictionary.addEncodedQuery('name=' + String(tableName) + '^element' + searchCriteria + '^ORDERBYcolumn_label');
            grDictionary.query();
            if (grDictionary.hasNext()) {
                gs.debug('Found custom fields in table : ' + tableName + ' - CustomFieldChecker');
                while (grDictionary.next()) {
                    // Push the field name to an array that we will use later to get the usage stats for our custom fields.
                    allCustomFields.push(grDictionary.getValue('element'));

                    // Create an object that we will use to store the values that represent the fields available in the MVRS on our Catalog Item.
                    var mvrsValueEntry = {};

                    // Get the dictionary values and build a mvrsValueEntry object with them. We will use this object to form the payload we send back to automatically populate our MVRS.
                    for (var field in mvrsFieldNames) {
                        mvrsValueEntry[String(mvrsFieldNames[field])] = grDictionary.getValue(String(mvrsFieldNames[field]));
                    }
                    // Push the object to the array to build our payload for the MulitRow Variable Set.
                    mvrsValues.push(mvrsValueEntry);
                }

                // Get the Usage Statistics for all the custom fields that are in scope for our table.
                var customFieldUsage = this.checkFieldUsage(tableName, String(allCustomFields));
				var fieldUsage = customFieldUsage[0];
				var allRecords = customFieldUsage[1];

                // Add the Field Usage Stats into our Payload before we return it from the function and populate the MVRS with it.
                for (var usageStat in fieldUsage) {
                    var customFieldRecord = this.findArrayObject(mvrsValues, fieldUsage[usageStat].field_name, 'element');
                    if (customFieldRecord) {
                        customFieldRecord['records_using_field'] = fieldUsage[usageStat].records_using_field;
                        customFieldRecord['percentage_using_field'] = fieldUsage[usageStat].percentage_using_field;
                    }
                }
				
                gs.debug('Custom Field MVRS Payload: ' + JSON.stringify(mvrsValues, null, 2) + ' - CustomFieldChecker');

                return JSON.stringify([mvrsValues, allRecords, gs.getMessage('custom_field_check.field_success', Math.round(mvrsValues.length) ), Math.round(mvrsValues.length)]);
            } else {
                // No records found
                gs.debug('No custom fields found in table : ' + tableName + ' - CustomFieldChecker');
				return JSON.stringify(['no_custom_fields', this.getTableRecordCount(tableName), gs.getMessage('custom_field_check.field_failure')]);
            }
            //
        } catch (err) {
            gs.error(err, 'CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils');
        }
    },

    findArrayObject: function(array, key, prop) {
        try {
            // Optional, but fallback to key['name'] if not selected
            prop = (typeof prop === 'undefined') ? 'name' : prop;

            for (var i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
                if (array[i][prop] === key) {
                    return array[i];
                }
            }
        } catch (err) {
            gs.error(err, 'CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils');
        }
    },

    getTableAttribute: function(tableSysId, attribute) {
        try {
            var grDbObject = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
            if (grDbObject.get(tableSysId)) {
                return grDbObject.getValue(String(attribute));
            }
        } catch (err) {
            gs.error(err, 'CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils');
        }
    },

    getTableRecordCount: function(tableName) {
        try {
            var tableSysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_table_name');
			var table;
			tableName ? table = tableName : this.getTableAttribute(tableSysId, 'name');
            var time = this.getParameter('sysparm_time_value');

            var countAll = new GlideAggregate(table);
            if (time) {
                countAll.addEncodedQuery(time);
            }
            countAll.addAggregate('COUNT');
            countAll.query();
            var allRecords = 0;
            if (countAll.next()) {
                allRecords = countAll.getAggregate('COUNT');
            }
            return allRecords;
        } catch (err) {
            gs.error(err, 'CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils');
        }
    },

    type: 'CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-23 21:53:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>e533933bdb6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>44</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CustomFieldCheckerClientUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e533933bdb6afd10ccdf0bd3e29619b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ethan.davies@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-28 18:30:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
